title: How Long Does It Take To Add A New Champion To LOL

replies.body:
Depends on what you mean.

Fact is a champion concept has to be come up with, then you have to have concepts for skills, then coding for that sort of thing along with the numbers of damages, and then balance testing etc.

Or if you mean how often Rito releases champions, usually we are getting a champion around every 2 months.

This.

From concept to release can take years in some cases (for example, Ao Shin, who may or may not be released in the future). From the release of the previous champion, it's usually just a few patches (but that's because the concept started many months prior).

About 2 months

Back in the days of S1-3 it was about 2 weeks

Explains why Poppy got a rework!!
